short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a sepia filter to the map on Google Maps when viewing Mexico, so you can feel like you are in a Hollywood Movie!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension adds a sepia filter to the map on Google Maps when viewing Mexico, invoking the aesthetics of American movies. This is obviously a joke inspired by the great memes about how Mexico is shown in shows like Breaking Bad.
